biotools.summary:
AEON is a Python framework (with Rust backend) for analysis of Boolean networks. It supports a wide range of techniques: (1) Loading/storing networks from SBML-qual, .bnet and .aeon format. (2) Support for partially specified networks with uncertain dynamics. (3) Attractor computation and bifurcation analysis. (4) Model checking and property classification based on (H)CTL. (5) Control and reprogramming using one step/permanent/temporary perturbations.

You can learn more about the usage of AEON in the "examples" folder of the git repository.

bioschemas.name: AEON.py
